name: Task Donegeon - 0.0.72 - Performance & Responsiveness Overhaul
lastChange: Major performance refactor with split contexts. Implemented responsive table-to-card layouts for all management pages. Added accessibility focus trapping to all dialogs. Added to-do indicators on calendar. Cleaned up obsolete files.
description: A gamified task and chore tracker for families and groups. Complete quests, earn currency and experience, and level up your character in a fun, medieval-themed adventure.
